name: Casino Rumble
description:
The Chips have gone rouge. Survive for as long as you can with different types of chips having guaranteed max stats! Keep in mind people are still playing, dice will come to crush you or the chips! With the end of each round you will spin a slot machine with a risk of gaining stats or losing stats.

This game was made in the span of 3 days as it was entered in the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!
